name: Visitors Inn

reviews.title: Nice Surprise!
reviews.text: I took a tour of the Visitor's Inn tonight after work and must say I was very impressed with this place. A friend is looking for a place to stay in June of next year and having seen it off the highway for years, I thought this might be a good place to start my search for accomodations for her. I'll give you a list of the pro's listed below:

description: "Luxurious and affordable". Our array of exceptional accommodations includes 60 tastefully appointed guest rooms featuring all queen and king size beds, Kitchenette rooms, and Special Jacuzzi Suites. An extensive list of in-room amenities including: Flat Screen TV’s, cordless telephones, FREE high speed internet, individually controlled heat/AC units, coffee makers, irons & ironing boards, fridges, mini-bars, cable & satellite TV, free local calls, personal safes, hairdryers, alarm clock radios, complimentary newspapers and more. Unwind, relax and enjoy our beautiful indoor pool, sauna, Jacuzzi, and exercise room. Other features include the VIP restaurant, Conference facilities, and plenty of free parking. Conveniently located minutes from McMaster University/Hospital, and Downtown Hamilton.
